# Demo: Runbook Testing

This runbook demonstrates the testing framework features.

## Step 1: Check Prerequisites

<Check 
  id="check-git"
  title="Check Git Version"
  path="checks/check-git.sh"
/>

## Step 2: Configure Project

Enter your project details:

<Inputs id="project" path="templates/project/boilerplate.yml" />

## Step 3: Create Project

<Command
  id="create-project"
  title="Create Project"
  path="scripts/create-project.sh"
/>

## Step 4: Generate Configuration

<Template
  id="project-template"
  title="Generate Project Files"
  inputs="project"
  path="templates/project"
/>

## Step 5: Verify

<Check
  id="verify-project"
  title="Verify Project"
  path="checks/verify-project.sh"
/>
